titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, International Division, Latin America and the Caribbean
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, International Division, Latin America and the Caribbean FA1689

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-02-17 11:15:55 -0500.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, International Division, Latin America and the Caribbean

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of program files, field office files, and administrative records.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by field office or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
